## Post-Lecture Quiz

*Complete this quiz by checking one answer per question.*

1. What would the following code return: `'1' == 1`

- [ ] true
- [ ] false

2. Choose the correct operator to express _or_ logic

- [ ] `a | b`
- [ ] `a || b`
- [ ] `a or b`
